title: Person of Interest - 5x12 '.exe' - Sneak Peek #1
author: POISuit
comment: No wonder Bear looks so skinny this season; they're leaving him alone in the subway station in the dark for days at a time. Seriously, I know there's an AI war going on out there but The Machine has designated Bear as an asset so really they should also be taking some time to feed, water and walk him. Poor thing.

My only two thoughts here are "OMG Shaw's finally gonna have to hear that goddamn voice, i am not OK" and "WTF they left Bear in a (probably hot) subway tunnel for a week with no lights on and probably only the food and water in his bowl? Someone call the ASPCA."

What if Shaw hears Root's voice
What IF SHE SEES HER ROOM
